runs.comm: what a way to start! Irfan piches it on a good length and there's a lot of audacity in that shot as he clubs him over long-on, that went rows back
better delivery, he lands it outside off and he gets it to move away and beats him
stretches his bat out to leave but the ball moves away and nearly takes the edge
another superb delivery, this one cramps him for room and slices him with the late away movement
fullish on middle and off, he tucks it down to mid-on and a sliding save restricts it to a single
lands it bang on target and the batsman pats it back down the pitch, nice comeback after the first-ball six
bangs it in short and nearly slices him in half as the ball bends back
full outside and nearly scooped on the full to backward point
poor delivery and rightfully put away, he gives him width and the bounce sits up nicely for Ryder to slash it with control over backward point
Appeal! zaheer gets the ball to bend back in and catch Ryder on the pads but the ball may have missed leg, very close shout though
another snorter of a delivery, moves away late and beats him late on the forward prod
super shot! It was just fractionally short of a length and Ryder did extremely well to adjust and pull him on the front foot
cuts back in and he gets an inside edge as tries to drive through the off side
fires it short and wide down the leg side and McCullum tries to pull bit misses
Pathan swings it on the pads and it sits up nicely for the batsman as he whips it with ease high over deep square leg, he had tremendous bat speed on that one
gets the ball to bend back in through the air and he pushes it past the bowler
Pathan errs by bowling a half volley on the off stump and he swings him across the line and the ball runs to long-on
outside off and he angles it wide of backward point
attempted yorker turns into a low full toss and he gets across just a touch and clips it with ease past square leg
makes an impact straightaway as he gets it to cut back in and cause problems as McCullum gets forward too early
very unlucky for Ishant, McCullum gets forward early again and shapes to drive but gets am inside edge which beats the stumps and the keeper
streaky yet again and New Zealand will take the, he swishes hard to loft him over the off side but the ball flies off the top of the bat and travels to third man
that's a hat-trick of boundaries but this was asking to be punished, half volley outside off and lofted to long-off
holds the length back and he pushes it to the covers
tapped to the off side and a run-out chance is fluffed, Raina fails to gather the ball properly and McCullum scampers back to the crease
Ryder at his best, stays at the crease and nonchalantly swings a length ball high over wide long-on
gets a leading edge to the off side and Ishant dives to stop it and injures his shoulder, Rohit replaces him in the field
makes room and slices him over backward point, the ball travels like a bullet and Rohit does superbly to get a hand to it at third man
Zaheer just manages to hit the timber, the ball comes back in and the faintest of touches clips the off bail, I don't think Ryder saw that properly
Guptill gets an absolute beauty first up, the ball comes back in and moves in late, very well left
this one moves away and nearly takes the edge, Dhoni doesn't appeal though, I don't think there was an edge
he starts with a back of a length ball, angling into the batsman, pushed towards mid-on
it's shorter this time, Guptill gets on the backfoot and defends it back towards the bowler
short again, and on middle and leg, feeds Guptill's favourite pull, it's mistimed to midwicket
gets on the backfoot and defends it towards cover
an angled bat places the ball wide of the third man fielder, enough time for the batsmen to get two
tight line around off, Guptill opens the face and steers it towards backward point, "Wait on" is the call
lands it outside off and gets no turn, he punches it to the off side
that is too wide outside off, he makes room and slices it square of the wicket on the off side
gets on the backfoot and works it wide of point
floated on the pads and he chips it uppishly towards short midwicket
very well bowled, gives him no room as he taps it back to the bowler
and once again he keeps it tight, Guptill softly works it to the on side
drops it too short on middle and leg, he shuffles and clips it to the on side
skids through and works it wide of square leg
not much turn, he stays back and taps it wide of cover
this one straightens, he punches it to the off side
skids through quickly and he taps it back down the pitch
stays back and punches it down to mid-off
it skids through off a good length and he pats it back to the bowler
works it with the turn to the on side
opens the face of the bat and dabs it down to short third man for a quick single
well bowled again, he defends back to the bowler

very bizarre decision! Guptill aims to pull a short delivery and gets a thick inside edge onto his thigh, the Indians appeal and the inside edge was obvious to the naked eye, umpire Gary Baxter doesn't appear as if if he's going to give it out and then all of a sudden raises the finger, Guptill doesn't want to go and McCullum can't believe it either
gets forward and clips it to the on side
Dhoni sprints to the on side to effect a run out but the under arm flick misses the stumps
tapped back to the bowler
gets forward and pushes it down the track
drifts on the pads and he shuffles and works it away to the on side
makes room and clips it away to the off side
opens the face of the bat and takes the risk of dabbing it wide of slip
full marks for placement, harbhajan drops it a little too wide outside off, he makes room and cuts wide of the vacant backward point region and beats the sweeper
gets well forward and defends
gets forward and pushes it down to mid-off
stays on the backfoot and defends
stays on the backfoot and angles it down to point
shuffles and clips it with the turn wide of midwicket
shuffles and clips it down to square leg
gets across and the ball slides down leg and beats the keeper
pushes it down to long-on
nudged off the pads to the on side
gives him the charge to a full ball and forces it past the diving Jadeja
shuffles and clips it down to midwicket
pushes it quicker and he mistimes the punch to the off side
the doosra nearly squares him up as the ball clips his thigh and rolls to the off side
quicker through the air and the pitch, he gets behind the line and defends to the off side
makes room and places it wide of cover
Harbhajan fires that quick and the batsman's beaten on the pull as he seizes on the shot a little too early
strays just wide down the leg side and the ball is pulled back by fine leg
slides it on the pads and he works it to the on side
that will release the pressure, he gets on his knee and sweeps him on the up down to deep square leg
begins the new spell with a snorter that fizzes past McCullum's glove
he errs by sliding down the leg side, he shuffles and clips it just wide of Dhoni
another bonus for NZ as Zaheer strays on the pads, McCullum tries to clip it away but misses
Zaheer's struggling with his line to the right-handers, this one clips the thigh and beats Dhoni who gets a hand to it, fine leg mops up
Zaheer comes round the wicket, the ball cuts back in sharply and clips him on the pad well wide of the stumps, zaheer appeals anyway
angles it on  the pads and he nudges it to fine leg
gets across his stumps and pats it back
lands outside off, he taps it just wide of cover
gets forward and works it wide of point
rocks back and punches it wide of cover and he brings up yet another fifty
goes for a wild slog and he clears midwicket but not timed well enough
sweeps it to deep square-leg
shapes to pull a short ball but gets a thick edge on to the pads
It's a mishit over mid-on but it's safe from Irfan's grasp, too much to expect anyone to take that
jams out a yorker to mid-on
makes room to a slower delivery and flat-bats it to mid-off
Zaheer comes over the wicket and jams it on the blockhole outside leg, he makes room and digs it out to deep square-leg
fires it on the blockhole, he digs it out and it's a dot ball, superb delivery
mows it to midwicket and there's a fumble
the intention was right but the bouncer was just a little too high for Taylor, it's signalled a wide
bowls a superb inswinging yorker, he manages to dig it out on the full to long-off

that's a classic delivery and Irfan has done it for his captain, he bowls a searing inswinging yorker angling in on the off stump, Taylor makes a bit of room to forces it through the off side but the speed and movement beats him and clips the off stump

That's two in two! What a bowling change! It's a rank bad delivery outside off and Oram has himself to blame, he chases a short and wide delivery, tries to slice it over the slips and tamely edges it to Dhoni,
swings it on the pads and he clips it with ease down to deep square-leg
McCullum tries to throw the bowler off balance by shuffling across early but Irfan bowls it fast and straight and forces McCullum to defend
he gets on his knee to a full delivery  and fetches it from the off stump and places the ball to deep square-leg
steps down and smacks him wide of cover, the ball dares to beat Raina but he times his dive to perfection and saves 2 precious runs
makes room and slams it just wide of cover, all power
Broom finds the gap, he makes room to a full ball and slams it wide of backward point on the front foot
and it's Irfan again, Broom gets on his knee to a flighted delivery and tries to slog him over midwicket but the top edge is skied to Irfan at midwicket
swing and a miss, the ball is much shorter
that was slammed through the off side like a tracer bullet, shades of Klusener! The fielder at sweeper cover had no chance
swings it on the pads, the ball clips the pads and rolls to the on side, they scamper a single
full and swinging in and he fails to put away the yorker, the ball rolls to the on side
Irfan gets it right again, he bowls another unplayable inswinger on the off stump and he digs it out to the off side
McCullum gets under this pitched up ball and swings over midwicket, that's a cracker of a shot
McCullum goes one better! The ball is pitched up on middle and leg, he scoops it over the bowler's head and long-off dives in despair

Rohit runs back and nearly pulls off a catch running backwards! McCullum flat-bats a length ball and mishits it over the off side, Rohit is a little too close at mid-off and the ball beats him in the air as he runs back, he fails to get a hand to it, really Brendon McCullum would have had his heart in his mouth, nevertheless, it's been a terrific game
